name: Iodine (Lugol's / Nascent)
description: Essential trace element critical for thyroid function, metabolism, and cellular health. Deficiency is widespread globally and linked to cognitive decline, metabolic dysfunction, and increased cancer risk. Supports thyroid hormone production (T3/T4).

dosage.notes: RDA is 150mcg. Higher doses (mg range) controversial â€” requires selenium co-supplementation. Start low with thyroid monitoring.

keyFindings: 2 billion people worldwide are iodine deficient (WHO)
Japanese dietary intake (~1-3mg/day) associated with lower breast cancer rates
Essential for cognitive development and maintenance throughout life
contraindications: Hashimoto thyroiditis (use with caution, low dose)
